name: TapTapTap
description:
NEW! -> Now download it in your Android phone!!

Game

Tap Tap Tap Game is a prototype game that based on the mechanic of one touch. The player will have to defend the base, located in the center, of the different enemy waves that will appear following the style of the arcade games.

Developers
  • Iker Gutiérrez
  • Gonzalo Herrero
  • Guillermo Meléndez
